name: Jake Hunter Detective Story: Prism of Eyes
summary:
Don't Just Play as Jake Hunter! Play as Three Protagonists for the First Time in the Series.

Three protagonists in one game? And the possibility of playing them individually? Jake Hunter Detective Story: Prism of Eyes got you covered. You can play as Jake Hunter Jake Hunter Detective Story: Prism of Eyes. At the same time, view the game in the eyes of Scott Kingsley (Sanzou Kumano) and Yulia Marks (Youko Misono). This gives players the freedom of experiencing different tastes compared with its previous titles.

It doesn't stop there. Apart from the three main storylines that you can unveil, there will also be 10 chosen scenarios from the mobile version. But this time, it's converted with an HD touch.
